original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: The bodhisattva great beings have entered into, are entering into, and will enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽are fully awakening,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of good conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid @13b dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid @13b dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-observation, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, and great compassion.

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /
translated: the great joy, and the great equanimity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: The immeasurable other qualities of the Buddha are also taught in detail.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: @14a *// rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: @14a *// rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: For this reason, a son of good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: a daughter of good family who writes out this perfection of wisdom in book form and gives it to others to read and to write and to recite aloud,

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: should know that their merit increases even more than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka //
analyzed: koo shi ka //
translated: Kauśika!

analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: It is because all dharmas are taught in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do; ;'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Paranirmitavaśavartin gods exist.

analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmakāyika gods exist.🔽The Brahmapurohita gods exist.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmapārṣadya gods exist.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Mahābrahmā gods exist.🔽The Ābhāsvara gods exist.

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Parīttābha gods exist.🔽The Apramāṇābha gods exist.

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Ābhāsvara gods exist.🔽The Śubhakṛtsna gods exist.

original: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Parīttaśubha gods exist.

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Apramāṇaśubha gods exist.

original: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha @14b rnams yod do //
analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha @14b rnams yod do //
translated: The Śubhakṛtsna gods exist.🔽The Bṛhatphala gods exist.

original: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.🔽There are gods of the Trāyastriṃśa realm.🔽There are gods of the Yāma realm.🔽There are gods of the Tuṣita realm.🔽There are gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm.🔽There are gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm.🔽There are gods of the Brahmakāyika realm.🔽There are gods of the Ābhāsvara realm.

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Śubhakṛtsna realm.

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Bṛhatphala realm.

original: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Atapa realm.🔽There are gods of the Sudarśana realm.

original: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do // gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Akaniṣṭha realm.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Ākāśānantyāyatana realm.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Vijñānānantyāyatana realm.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Ākiñcanyāyatana realm.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana realm.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of moral discipline.🔽There is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of wisdom exists,

original: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: inner emptiness exists,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness exists,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: unconditioned emptiness exists,🔽the emptiness of beyond extremes exists,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of that which has no beginning or end exists,

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of nonrejection exists,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena exists,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics exists,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽dngos po @15a *//
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do // dngos po @15a *//
translated: the emptiness of nonapprehension exists,

original: med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: med pa stong pa nyid yod do //

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //
translated: the right efforts,🔽the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do //

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: the noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilizations,

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: the immeasurables,🔽the formless absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do; ;rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: the nine serial absorptions,🔽the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness that are doors to liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do; ;mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do; ;mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //
translated: the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do; ;so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the fearlessnesses exist, the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: great compassion exists,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
translated: and the distinct attributes of a buddha exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: The result of stream enterer exists,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of once-returner exists,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: the result of non-returner exists,🔽the state of a worthy one exists,

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: the state of a pratyekabuddha exists,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects exists,

original: rnam pa @15b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa @15b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects exists.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: Stream enterers exist,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: once-returners exist,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: non-returners exist,

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: worthy ones exist,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: pratyekabuddhas exist,🔽and buddhas exist.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: and the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas exist.

original: koo shi ka /🔽'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
translated: if some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to establish as many beings as there are in the eastern direction’s world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river in the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na /🔽koo shi ka /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na / koo shi ka /
translated: were to establish them in the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the five superknowledges,

original: de ji snyam du sems /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: what do you think, Kauśika?

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family generate a lot of merit on that basis?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: a lot, Well-Gone One, a lot!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Lord said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de bas rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: “Therefore, Kauśika, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who gives to others this perfection of wisdom to read, to write, and to recite would have even more merit.

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /🔽de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te / de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: it is because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught in detail,

original: @16a *// rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: @16a *// rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and having trained in them, sons of a good family or daughters of a good family have entered into perfect homelessness,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: are entering into perfect homelessness, and will enter into perfect homelessness;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the result of stream enterer,

original: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo / 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: are attaining the result of stream enterer, and will attain the result of stream enterer;

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the result of once-returner,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: are attaining the result of once-returner, and will attain the result of once-returner;

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the result of non-returner,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained the state of an arhat,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain,🔽those who follow the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas have attained, will attain,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: their individual enlightenment,🔽the bodhisattva mahāsattvas have entered, will enter,🔽into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood,

original: 'jug go // 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go // 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: have attained, will attain,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the highest, complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / @16b chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / @16b chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom;🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of nonentities, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of nonentities, the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of manifestation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, great compassion,

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag @17a *//
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag @17a *//
translated: great joy, and great equanimity,

original: kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: and other limitless buddhadharmas have been extensively taught.

original: koo shi ka /🔽rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: because of this one of many explanations, you should know that a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who writes out the perfection of wisdom in book form and gives it to others to read and to write out and to recite aloud

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: will have an increase in merit that is much greater than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: It is because all dharmas are taught in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of them, the great and powerful kṣatriya clans exist.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //🔽khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: The great and powerful brahmin clans exist.🔽The great and powerful householder clans exist.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Cāturmahā­rājika gods exist.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Trāyastriṃśa gods exist.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Yāma gods exist.🔽The Tuṣita gods exist.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Nirmāṇarati gods exist.🔽The Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin gods exist.

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmakāyika gods exist.🔽The Brahmapurohita gods exist.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Brahmapārṣadya gods exist.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Mahābrahmāṇa gods exist.

original: snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The Ābhā gods exist.

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Limited Radiance,🔽the gods of Immeasurable Radiance,

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do // chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Luminous Radiance,🔽the gods of Limited Virtue,

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Immeasurable Virtue,

original: @17b dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: @17b dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do // che ba'i lha rnams yod do // chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Vast Virtue,🔽the gods of Limited Good,

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Immeasurable Good,

original: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Great Fruit,

original: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of No Hardship,🔽the gods of Excellent Vision,

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Excellent Appearance,

original: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of Akaniṣṭha,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Limitless Space,

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the Sphere of Limitless Consciousness,🔽and the gods of the Sphere of Nothingness.

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of nothingness,

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception,

original: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of morality,🔽the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽nang stong pa nyid yod do //🔽phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // nang stong pa nyid yod do // phyi stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom.🔽There is the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of external phenomena,🔽the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of great extent,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless exists.🔽“The emptiness of non-rejection exists.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of inherent existence exists.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of all phenomena exists.

original: rang gi mchan nyid stong pa nyid yod do //🔽mi dmigs @18a *//🔽pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rang gi mchan nyid stong pa nyid yod do // mi dmigs @18a *// pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics exists.🔽“The emptiness of non-apprehension exists.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of non-entities exists.🔽“The emptiness of essential nature exists.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: “The emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities exists.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //
translated: “The applications of mindfulness exist.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //
translated: “The right efforts exist.🔽“The legs of miraculous power exist.

original: dbang po rnams yod do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams yod do //
translated: “The faculties exist.

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //
translated: “The powers exist.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //
translated: “The branches of awakening exist. “The noble eightfold path exists.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //
translated: “The noble truths exist.

original: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //
translated: “The meditative stabilities exist.

original: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //
translated: the immeasurables exist,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //
translated: the formless absorptions exist,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do //
translated: the eight liberations exist,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do //
translated: the nine serial absorptions exist,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do //
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation exist,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do /
translated: the clairvoyances exist,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //
translated: the meditative stabilities exist,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways exist,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas exist, the fearlessnesses exist,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges exist,

original: snying rje chen po yod do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po yod do //
translated: great compassion exists,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do //
translated: and the distinct attributes of the buddhas exist.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: The result of stream enterer exists,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of once-returner exists,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do //
translated: the result of non-returner exists,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yod do //
translated: and the state of a worthy one exists.

original: rang byang chub yod do //
analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //
translated: “There is a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam par @18b shes pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam par @18b shes pa nyid yod do //
translated: “There is the knowledge of path aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do //
translated: “There is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do //
translated: “There are stream enterers.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //
translated: “There are once-returners.🔽“There are non-returners.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //
translated: “There are worthy ones.

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: “There are pratyekabuddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do //
translated: “There are bodhisattva great beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do //
translated: “There are tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: koo shi ka /🔽steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de /
translated: if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to establish as many beings as there are in the eastern direction’s world systems as many as there are in the eastern direction’s world systems in the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na /
translated: and the four formless absorptions, and the five kinds of clairvoyance,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think?

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Would that son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: daughter of a good family on that account generate a lot of merit?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: it would be a lot.🔽Well-Gone One, it would be a lot.”

original: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de bas rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: therefore, if a son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: daughter of a good family gives to others this perfection of wisdom to read and to write and to recite aloud,

original: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: the merit would increase a lot more.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bas zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bas zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because in this perfection of wisdom the dharmas without outflows are taught extensively.

original: @19a *// de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: @19a *// de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage or

original: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: daughters of enlightened heritage have entered into the secure state,

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: are entering into the secure state, and will enter into the secure state;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the fruit of entering the stream;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to //
translated: have attained, are attaining, and will attain arhatship;🔽have attained, are attaining, and will attain individual enlightenment;

original: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: thob bo // 'thob par 'gyur ro // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to //
translated: and have attained, are attaining, and will attain the level of buddhahood.

original: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug go / 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas have entered into, are entering into, and will enter into the secure state of the bodhisattvas;

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽are fully awakening,

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: what are those uncontaminated dharmas?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of giving, the perfection of good conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @19b nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi @19b nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,🔽the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gates of liberation, the six clairvoyances, all the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, great love, and great compassion.

original: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med @20a *//
analyzed: dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med @20a *//
translated: the great joy, and the great equanimity.

original: pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to //
translated: The immeasurable buddhadharmas are also taught in detail.

original: koo shi ka /🔽rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na /
translated: through this one of many explanations, you should understand that a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who gives to others the perfection of wisdom written out in book form, for the sake of reading it, reciting it, and properly paying attention to it,

original: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o //
translated: will have a lot more merit than that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te /
translated: it is because all dharmas are taught in detail in this perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: Because of their existence, there are the great and high-status warrior-noble families.

original: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do //
translated: There are the great and high-status brahmin families.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do //
translated: There are the great and high-status head-householder families.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings exist.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three exist.

original: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do // dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Yāma Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Tuṣita Heaven exist.

original: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do //🔽gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Nirmāṇarati Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Paranirmitavaśavartin Heaven exist.

original: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmākāyika Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Brahmapurohita Heaven exist.

original: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Brahmapārṣadya Heaven exist.

original: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do //🔽snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Mahābrahmāṇa Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven exist.

original: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do //🔽tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung snang gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttābha Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Apramāṇābha Heaven exist.

original: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Ābhāsvara Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven exist.

original: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung dge'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Parīttaśubha Heaven exist.

original: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽dge @20b rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge @20b rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Apramāṇaśubha Heaven exist.🔽The gods of the Śubhakṛtsna Heaven exist.

original: che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: The gods of the Bṛhatphala Heaven exist.

original: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: chung che'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm.🔽There are gods of the Trāyastriṃśa realm.🔽There are gods of the Yāma realm.🔽There are gods of the Tuṣita realm.

original: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Nirmāṇa­rata realm.🔽There are gods of the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin realm.🔽There are gods of the Brahmakāyika realm.🔽There are gods of the Ābhāsvara realm.

original: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do; ;mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Śubhakṛtsna realm.🔽There are gods of the Bṛhatphala realm.🔽There are gods of the Atapa realm.

original: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do //🔽'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Sudarśana realm.🔽There are gods of the Akaniṣṭha realm.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
translated: There are gods of the Ākāśānantyāyatana realm.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //
analyzed: cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do //

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa yod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa yod do //
translated: There is the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability exists,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do //

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: ultimate emptiness exists,🔽conditioned emptiness exists,

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena exists,

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do // mi dmigs @21a *// pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics exists,🔽the emptiness of nonapprehension exists,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do //
translated: the emptiness of nonexistence exists,🔽and the emptiness of intrinsic nature exists.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do //
translated: The right efforts exist.🔽The legs of miraculous power exist.

analyzed: dbang po rnams yod do //

original: stobs rnams yod do //
analyzed: stobs rnams yod do //

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do; ;'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams yod do //

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do //

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do; ;mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: rang byang chub yod do //

analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa @21b shes pa nyid yod do //

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do //

analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams yod do //

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //

original: gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /

translated: It is the proper mental attention of a mind that neither engages in duality nor does not engage in duality with regard to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is the proper mental attention of a mind that neither engages in duality nor does not engage in duality with regard to the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la @25a *//🔽byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la @25a *//🔽byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: It is the proper mental attention of a mind that neither engages in duality nor does not engage in duality with regard to the fearlessnesses.🔽It is the proper mental attention of a mind that neither engages in duality nor does not engage in duality with regard to the detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The four kinds of exact knowledge are properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Great compassion is properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The eighteen special qualities of the Buddha are properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o // gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of all modes is properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //🔽gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin /
translated: The knowledge of paths is properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.🔽The knowledge of all that is the case and is not the case is properly attended to with a mind that does not operate dualistically or non-dualistically.

original: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o //
translated: and with a mind that is neither of the second person nor of the third person, he or she attends properly to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
translated: if a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family teaches this perfection of wisdom to others in many ways, in detail, explains it, elucidates it, reveals it, expounds it, and demonstrates its meaning,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de la shes @25b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni /🔽'di yin te /
analyzed: de la shes @25b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni / 'di yin te /
translated: the meaning of the perfection of wisdom is this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /🔽gnyis su lta ba ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / gnyis su lta ba ma yin /
translated: The perfection of wisdom🔽is not a view of duality,

original: gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin /🔽mtshan mar ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin / mtshan mar ma yin /
translated: is not a view of nonduality,🔽is not a sign,

original: mtshan ma med par ma yin /🔽blang bar ma yin /🔽dor bar ma yin /🔽dbri bar ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par ma yin / blang bar ma yin / dor bar ma yin / dbri bar ma yin /
translated: is not signless,🔽is not something to be taken up,

original: bsnan par ma yin /
analyzed: bsnan par ma yin /
translated: is not something to be put down,🔽is not something to be subtracted,🔽is not something to be added,

original: kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin /
translated: It is not defiled.

original: rnam par byang bar ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang bar ma yin /
translated: It is not purified.

original: skye bar ma yin /
analyzed: skye bar ma yin /
translated: It is not arising.

original: 'gag par ma yin /🔽gzung bar ma yin /🔽mi gzung bar ma yin /
analyzed: 'gag par ma yin / gzung bar ma yin / mi gzung bar ma yin /
translated: It is not ceasing.🔽It is not apprehended.🔽It is not non-apprehended.

original: len par ma yin /
analyzed: len par ma yin /
translated: It is not taken up.

original: dor bar ma yin /🔽gnas bar ma yin /
analyzed: dor bar ma yin / gnas bar ma yin /
translated: It is not put down.🔽It is not abiding.

original: mi gnas par ma yin /🔽yang dag par ma yin /
analyzed: mi gnas par ma yin / yang dag par ma yin /
translated: It is not non-abiding.🔽It is not right.

original: log par ma yin /🔽ldan par ma yin /
analyzed: log par ma yin / ldan par ma yin /
translated: It is not wrong.🔽It is not possessed.

original: mi ldan par ma yin /🔽'dre bar ma yin /
analyzed: mi ldan par ma yin / 'dre bar ma yin /
translated: It is not non-possessed.🔽It is not mixed.

original: mi 'dre bar ma yin /🔽rkyen du ma yin /
analyzed: mi 'dre bar ma yin / rkyen du ma yin /
translated: It is not unmixed.🔽It is not a condition.

original: rkyen med par ma yin /🔽chos su ma yin /
analyzed: rkyen med par ma yin / chos su ma yin /
translated: It is not a non-condition.🔽It is not a phenomenon.

original: chos ma yin par ma yin /🔽de bzhin nyid du ma yin /
analyzed: chos ma yin par ma yin / de bzhin nyid du ma yin /
translated: It is not a non-phenomenon.🔽It is not suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin /🔽yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin / yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin /
translated: It is not a non-suchness.🔽It is not the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te /
translated: It is not a non-limit of reality.

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is not a son of noble family.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing /
translated: “If, Kauśika, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to teach, demonstrate, explain, expound,

original: de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
analyzed: de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
translated: disentangle, clarify, and fully teach this perfection of wisdom to others,

original: bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi /🔽bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba'am /
analyzed: bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi / bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba'am /
translated: they would increase much merit.🔽It is not that they would increase much merit by themselves taking it up,

original: kun chub par byas pa'am /
analyzed: kun chub par byas pa'am /
translated: mastering it,

original: bcangs pa'am / @26a *//
analyzed: bcangs pa'am / @26a *//

analyzed: bklags pa'am / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni / ma yin no //

original: koo shi ka /🔽gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Furthermore, Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de /

analyzed: 'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /

analyzed: de gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing /
translated: and teach it, explain it, expound it,🔽and make it clear to others in detail,

original: de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
analyzed: de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na /
translated: and if they teach its meaning by way of the definitive instruction,

original: koo shi ka /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,🔽that son of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni /

analyzed: shin tu mang du 'phel lo //

analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: should that son of a good family

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi'am /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: that son of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan /
translated: or that daughter of a good family should teach the perfection of wisdom in that way, with its meaning

analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par byas te /

analyzed: koo shi ka / de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Kauśika,🔽that son of a good family

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo ni /

analyzed: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: will possess immeasurable, incalculable heaps of merit.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: gal te rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo la las shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @26b sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang /
