analyzed: phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang; sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang /
translated: powders, clothing, parasols, flags, and banners, and with various kinds of music, and with every item of human happiness, immeasurable, incalculable tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas in the eastern direction for as long as they live,

original: mchod pa byas pa bas /
analyzed: mchod pa byas pa bas /

original: koo shi ka /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni /

analyzed: ches mang du 'phel lo // de ci'i phyir zhe na; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: that would be the greater one.🔽And why? Because the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the past,🔽future, and present have fully awakened, will fully awaken, and are fully awakening to unsurpassed, genuinely perfect buddhahood through having trained in this perfection of wisdom.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They have fully awakened, will fully awaken, and are fully awakening to unsurpassed, genuinely perfect buddhahood through having trained in this perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: koo shi ka; gal te rigs kyi bu'am /

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan /

analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing /

original: rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na /
analyzed: rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na /
translated: if they were to explain it, demonstrate it, and make it clear.🔽That son of a good family

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni /

translated: I am cultivating it like this,’ then by cultivating wisdom like this, it becomes just wisdom, and it is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽Kauśika,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na; brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na /
translated: “How should great bodhisattva beings practice so as to perfect the transcendent perfection of perseverance?

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @33a *//🔽yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa @33a *// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na /
translated: “How should great bodhisattva beings practice so as to perfect the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “How should great bodhisattva beings practice so as to perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom?”

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Kauśika,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe yongs su gtong ba mi dmigs /
translated: here, when great bodhisattva beings are practicing generosity, they should not apprehend the act of giving,

original: sbyin pa dang / len pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / len pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend either the one who gives or the one who receives.

original: tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba mi dmigs so //
translated: When he is practicing morality, he does not apprehend either morality or the one who is practicing morality.

original: bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe bzod pa dang / bzod pa sgom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe bzod pa dang / bzod pa sgom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: When he is cultivating patience, he does not apprehend either patience or the one who is cultivating patience.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe brtson 'grus dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: When he is making an effort at perseverance, he does not apprehend either perseverance or the one who is making an effort.

original: bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan sgom pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe bsam gtan dang / bsam gtan sgom pa mi dmigs so //
translated: When he is becoming absorbed in concentration, he does not apprehend either concentration or the one who is becoming absorbed.

original: shes rab sgom pa'i tshe shes rab dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shes rab sgom pa'i tshe shes rab dang / shes rab sgom pa dang / shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so //
translated: When he is cultivating wisdom, he does not apprehend either wisdom or the one who is cultivating wisdom.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who practices like this

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: completes the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: He completes the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will perfect the perfection of patience;

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will perfect the perfection of perseverance;

original: bsam gtan gyi pha @33b rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha @33b rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will perfect the perfection of concentration;

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will perfect the perfection of wisdom.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan /

analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o // de ltar khong du chud pa med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan / yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o // de ltar khong du chud pa med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang ldan /
translated: or daughters of a good family who have not understood should teach the perfection of wisdom with its meaning and with its letters.🔽Sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who have not understood should teach the perfection of concentration with its meaning and with its letters.

original: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //
translated: Sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who have not understood should teach the perfection of perseverance with its meaning and with its letters.

analyzed: de ltar khong du chud pa med par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan /

analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar khong du chud pa med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan /

original: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //

translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste /

translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who have set out for unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment will also, on hearing this reflected image, turn away from the path.

analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o //
